description:
Naruto is again attacked by the second evil ninja, Jiga. Jiga threatens Naruto`s life when Hinata rushes in to save Naruto, but Hinata resists the threats and begins to fight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Byakugan Saw It! The Magnet User`s Blind Spot
Byakugan wa Mita! Jiki Tsukai no Shikaku
Le point faible de l`homme magnétique
มองเห็นด้วยเนตรสีขาว จุดบอดของคาถาแม่เหล็ก
白眼は見た! 磁気使いの死角
